text: Yield to the Night (also known as Blonde Sinner) is a 1956 British crime drama movie directed by J. Lee Thompson and is based on the 1954 novel of the same name by Joan Henry. It stars Diana Dors, Yvonne Mitchell, Michael Craig, Geoffrey Keen, Marjorie Rhodes, Dandy Nichols, Molly Urquhart, Harry Locke and was distributed by Associated British-Path√©. ==Other websites== * * Category:1956 crime drama movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by J. Lee Thompson Category:Movies about capital punishment
title: Yield to the Night
